actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-198.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 239 - 181 (Record Vote No: 228).

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against consideration of the bill (H.R. 2959) making appropriations for energy and water development for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1986, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the consideration of H.R. 2959 (energy and water development appropriations).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against consideration of the bill (H.R. 2959) making appropriations for energy and water development for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1986, and for other purposes.
